sources.title: Children Galore (1955)
sources.description: Children Galore  is a 1955  comedy  film directed by  Terence Fisher .  It stars  Eddie Byrne  and  June Thorburn .   A village squire offers to give away a cottage to a deserving family with the most grandchildren.

metadata.Plot: The Joneses compete for a cottage offered by a British lord to the couple with the most grandchildren.
metadata.Writer: John Bonnet, Emery Bonnett, Peter Plaskett
metadata.Actors: Eddie Byrne, June Thorburn, Betty Ann Davies
